## Session.bye() method

Send a BYE request. Terminating a session. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3261\#section-15

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bye(delegate?: OutgoingRequestDelegate, options?: RequestOptions): OutgoingByeRequest;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  delegate | <code>OutgoingRequestDelegate</code> | Request delegate. |
|  options | <code>RequestOptions</code> | Options bucket. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`OutgoingByeRequest`
